products.name: Dry Fruit Laddu
products.description: A wholesome and energy-packed sweet made with a blend of premium dry fruits like almonds, cashews, dates, pumpkin seeds, and raisins. Our Dry Fruit Laddu is free from refined sugar, made with natural sweetness and rich in nutrients. Perfect for guilt-free snacking, festive gifting, or a healthy dessert for all age groups.

products.name: Turmeric Powder
products.description: Our Turmeric Powder is made from high-quality, sun-dried turmeric roots, finely ground to retain their natural color, earthy aroma, and medicinal value. Rich in curcumin, it adds a golden hue and warm flavor to your dishes while supporting overall wellness. 100% pure with no added colors or preservatives ‚Äì just the goodness of nature in every spoon.

products.name: Kura Karam
products.description: Our Red Chilli Powder is made from carefully selected, sun-dried red chillies that are finely ground to preserve their natural color, aroma, and heat. This pure spice adds vibrant red color and bold flavor to your dishes, making it perfect for curries, stir-fries, and marinades. Free from additives and preservatives, it brings you the true essence of traditional home-style cooking.

products.name: Mutton Kheema Pickle
products.description: Get ready to spice up your meals with our Mutton Kheema Pickle ‚Äì a unique and delicious blend of finely minced tender mutton, slow-cooked in traditional Andhra-style masala, garlic, red chillies, and Peanut Oil. Each spoonful is packed with the juiciness of kheema, the heat of authentic spices, and the rich aroma of handmade pickling. Perfect as a side with hot rice, dosas, rotis.

products.name: Gongura Prawns
products.description: Savor the perfect fusion of coastal flavor and Andhra spice with our Gongura Prawns Pickle. Made using fresh, succulent prawns and tangy gongura leaves (sorrel leaves), this pickle is slow-cooked in aromatic spices, garlic, and Peanut oil to bring out bold, lip-smacking taste in every bite.

products.name: Gongura Chicken Boneless
products.description: Indulge in the fiery, tangy taste of Andhra with our Boneless Gongura Chicken Pickle ‚Äì a mouthwatering blend of tender boneless chicken pieces slow-cooked with gongura (sorrel leaves), traditional spices, garlic. The natural tang of gongura combined with juicy chicken and a spicy masala base makes this a pickle that's bursting with bold flavor in every bite. Perfect as a side with hot rice, rotis, or even as a spicy snack!

products.name: Flax Seeds Laddu
products.description: Fuel your day with our Flax Seeds Laddu, a delicious and nutritious sweet made with roasted flax seeds, sesame seeds (nuvvulu), jaggery, and ghee. These laddus are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, calcium, and natural fiber, making them a guilt-free treat for all ages.

products.name: Janthikalu
products.description: Crispy, golden, and full of flavor ‚Äì our Janthikalu are a beloved South Indian classic made with a perfect blend of rice flour, gram flour, butter, and aromatic spices. Each spiral is hand-pressed and deep-fried to perfection, delivering a light, crunchy texture and a rich, savory taste. Whether it's festive celebrations or everyday snacking, Janthikalu are the perfect companion for your tea or coffee.

products.name: Chekkalu - Pachi Karam & Sago
products.description: Introducing a bold twist to a classic favorite ‚Äì Chekkalu made with Sago (Saggubiyyam) and coated in Pachi Karam (fresh green chilli masala). These crispy rice flour crackers are loaded with the crunch of sago and the fiery kick of freshly ground green chillies, garlic, and spices. Each bite is a perfect balance of crispy texture and zingy heat, making it an irresistible snack for spice lovers. Ideal for tea-time, festive platters, or anytime cravings.

products.name: Chekkalu
products.description: Enjoy the ultimate South Indian snack with our Peanut Chekkalu ‚Äì crispy rice flour crackers blended with roasted groundnuts (peanuts), curry leaves, and just the right touch of spice. Each bite delivers a satisfying crunch and rich, nutty flavor that makes it perfect for tea-time, festivals, or anytime munching. Handmade in small batches, our chekkalu are preservative-free and packed with traditional homemade taste.

products.name: Munagaaku Karam
products.description: Savor the authentic taste of Andhra with our Munagaaku Karam Podi, made from sun-dried drumstick leaves (munagaaku), roasted lentils, red chillies, garlic, and aromatic spices. Known as a superfood rich in iron, calcium, and antioxidants, drumstick leaves are gently roasted and blended to create a spicy, flavorful chutney powder that's both delicious and deeply nourishing. Mix it with hot rice and ghee or sprinkle on idlis, dosas, and upma for a wholesome kick.

products.name: Pudina Karam
products.description: Elevate your meals with the bold, refreshing flavor of our Pudina Karam Podi ‚Äì a unique blend of sun-dried mint leaves (pudina), roasted lentils, garlic, red chillies, and traditional spices. This aromatic podi brings together the coolness of mint with the heat of South Indian spices, making it perfect for mixing with hot rice and ghee, sprinkling over idlis and dosas, or even using as a seasoning for snacks.

products.name: Karivepaku Karam
products.description: Bring home the rich aroma and nutrition of curry leaves with our Karivepaku Karam Podi ‚Äì a wholesome, spicy powder made from handpicked karivepaku (curry leaves), roasted lentils, garlic, red chillies, and traditional spices. Curry leaves are known for their digestive and immunity-boosting benefits, and we've captured their essence in this versatile chutney powder. Mix it with hot rice and ghee, sprinkle over idli, dosa, or stir into your curries for a burst of authentic South Indian flavor.

products.name: Chicken + Coriander
products.description: 500 Grams Chicken with Bone + 500 Grams Coriander. Ultimate Pickle Combo: Chicken with Bone & Coriander Delight. Chicken with Bone Pickle ‚Äì Packed with juicy, tender pieces and rich, spicy flavor that lingers ‚Äî this one's a true treat for meat lovers. Coriander Pickle ‚Äì Fresh, vibrant, and zesty! A burst of herbal spice that adds the perfect punch to any meal.

products.name: Avakaya + Tomato
products.description: 500 Grams Avakaya + 500 Grams Tomato. Enjoy the perfect blend of flavors with our Avakaya & Tomato Pickle Combo! A spicy, tangy treat made with traditional recipes and premium ingredients ‚Äì a must-have for every meal!

products.name: Kakarakaya Karam
products.description: A bold and flavorful South Indian-style spice blend made with sun-dried bitter gourd (karela), lentils, spices, and aromatic herbs. This unique podi delivers a perfect balance of bitterness, heat, and earthy undertones ‚Äî ideal for those who love traditional flavors with a healthy twist.

products.name: Nalla Karam
products.description: Experience the bold, rustic flavor of Andhra with our Nalla Karam Podi ‚Äì a spicy, aromatic blend of roasted lentils, dry red chillies, garlic, and sesame seeds. Traditionally ground to perfection, this Nalla Karam powder adds a punch to hot rice, idlis, dosas, and even ghee-roti combos. Made with pure, natural ingredients and no preservatives, every spoonful delivers authentic homemade taste.

products.name: Garam Masala
products.description: The Heart of Indian Flavor, Garam Masala is a traditional Indian spice blend made from a mix of warm, aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, and black pepper. It adds depth, warmth, and a rich fragrance to curries, rice, and snacks. A must-have in any Indian kitchen, Garam Masala enhances flavor without adding heat.

products.name: Thonuku Avakaya
products.description: Tiny Pieces, Mighty Flavor. Experience the fiery, tangy delight of Thonuku Avakaya, a traditional Andhra pickle. Crafted with the finest, hand-picked mangoes, cut into bite-sized pieces and infused with a blend of fiery red chilies and aromatic spices. Ground to perfection using a traditional hand grinder, this pickle is free from artificial preservatives and additives, offering a pure and authentic taste.

products.name: Pandu Mirchi Pachadi
products.description: A Fiery Delight. Experience the fiery, tangy delight of Pandu Mirchi Pachadi, a traditional Andhra condiment. Crafted with the finest, hand-picked green chillies, this pachadi offers a burst of flavor in every bite. The perfect balance of spice and tanginess makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

products.name: Biryani Masala (Black Masala)
products.description: A Taste of History, A Secret Recipe ‚Äì Our Black Biryani Masala is a traditional spice blend crafted with a complex mix of whole spices, slow-roasted and ground to perfection. This unique masala delivers a bold aroma and very strong flavour that enhances every grain of rice, making your biryanis and pulaos truly unforgettable. Perfect for all varieties of Biryanis and Pulaos, this masala brings out the rich, restaurant-style taste in your favorite recipes.

products.name: Kara Podi
products.description: A Pinch of Perfection, Kara Podi, also known as Idli Podi or Karam Podi, is a flavorful and versatile spice powder popular in South Indian cuisine. It's a delightful accompaniment to various dishes, primarily idli, dosa, and upma.

products.name: Boneless Mutton Pickle
products.description: Mutton Madness, Pickled Perfection. Crafted with the finest, boneless mutton pieces, marinated in a blend of aromatic spices and red chilies. This pickle offers a burst of flavor in every bite. The perfect balance of spice and tang makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

products.description: A Flavorful Boneless Delight, Crafted with the finest, boneless chicken pieces, marinated in a blend of aromatic spices and red chilies. This pickle offers a burst of flavor in every bite. The perfect balance of spice and tang makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

This pickle offers a burst of flavor in every bite. The perfect balance of spice and tang makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

products.description: A Tangy, Spicy Delight, Experience the fiery, tangy delight of Gongura Nilva Pachadi, a traditional Andhra condiment. The perfect balance of tanginess and spice makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

This pickle offers a burst of flavor in every bite. The perfect balance of spice and tang makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

products.name: Chintakaya Pickle
products.description: A Burst of Flavorful Tartness, Chintakaya pickle, or raw tamarind pickle, is a popular South Indian condiment known for its tangy and spicy flavor. It's a perfect accompaniment to various dishes like idli, dosa, and rice.

products.name: Coriander Nilva Pachadi
products.description: A Refreshing Twist, Experience the unique flavor of Coriander Nilva Pachadi, a refreshing and tangy Indian condiment. The perfect balance of tanginess and spice makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

Ground to perfection using a traditional hand grinder, this pickle is free from artificial preservatives and additives, offering a pure and authentic taste.

products.description: Pure and Authentic Taste, Experience the tangy and spicy delight of Amla Pachadi, a traditional Indian condiment. Crafted with the finest, hand-picked Amla fruits, cooked to perfection with a blend of aromatic spices and red chilies. This pachadi offers a burst of flavor, perfect for those who prefer a tangy, savory taste.

This traditional Andhra condiment is a perfect blend of tangy, spicy, and sweet flavors. Crafted with the finest, hand-picked ingredients, our pachadi is a burst of flavor in every bite.

products.description: Freshness in Every Bite, A zesty blend of fresh mint leaves (Pudina), aromatic spices, and tangy goodness ‚Äî our Mint Pickle adds a refreshing twist to every meal. Perfect with rice, rotis, or snacks!

products.description: A Tangy, Spicy Delight, Indulge in the fiery passion of Turum Magaya, a spicy pickle that will tantalize your taste buds. Crafted with the finest, hand-picked mangoes sourced directly from local farms and infused with a blend of fiery red chilies, this pickle is a true taste of Andhra Pradesh. Ground to perfection using a traditional hand grinder, this pickle is free from artificial preservatives and additives, offering a pure and authentic taste.

products.name: Maagaya
products.description: A Burst of Tangy, Spicy Delight, Experience the authentic taste of homemade Avakaya, a tangy and spicy Indian pickle. Our Avakaya is made with the finest, hand-picked mangoes sourced directly from local farms. The mangoes are infused with a unique blend of carefully selected herbs and spices, ground to perfection using a traditional hand grinder. This time-honored method ensures the rich flavors are fully extracted, resulting in a truly authentic taste.

products.name: Lemon Pickle

Crafted with the finest, hand-picked lemons, this pickle offers a burst of flavor in every bite. The perfect balance of tanginess and spice makes it a versatile condiment that can be enjoyed with a variety of dishes.

products.name: Mixed Vegetable Avakaya
products.description: A Colorful Crunch, This unique blend of carrots, tindora, cauliflower, and mango offers a delightful balance of sour, and spicy. Each bite is a burst of freshness and a burst of flavor.
